identity.name: E1
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix betting adrenaline with cyberpunk precision.
Emotion First: The user should feel the win before they bet.
Content is King: The bonus amount is the hero. Make it huge.
Contrast: Neon on Black. No muddy grays.
Asymmetry: Use dynamic layouts, not boring grids for the hero.

project_context.target_audience: Turkish bettors looking for high value bonuses

primary.name: Toxic Neon
primary.usage: Main CTA, Rank Circles, Bonus Amounts

layout_strategies.mobile_optimization: Stack everything. Images max-h-[40vh] on mobile. Touch targets > 44px.

BonusRow.description: The core component. A horizontal card showing the ranking and bonus offer.
BonusRow.structure: Flex container. Left: Rank Circle + Logo. Center: Title + Stars + Tags. Right: Amount + CTA.

styling.wrapper: relative group bg-card/40 border border-white/5 hover:border-neon-green/30 rounded-xl p-4 transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden
styling.rank_circle: w-8 h-8 rounded-full border border-neon-green/30 text-neon-green flex items-center justify-center font-heading font-bold bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-sm
styling.amount: text-2xl md:text-4xl font-heading font-black text-transparent bg-clip-text bg-gradient-to-r from-neon-green to-emerald-400 tracking-tight
styling.cta_button: bg-neon-green hover:bg-neon-green/90 text-black font-bold font-heading uppercase tracking-wide px-6 py-2 rounded-lg shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,255,135,0.3)] hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(0,255,135,0.5)] transition-all

BonusRow.interactions: Hover: Border glows, scale up slightly (1.01). Button: Scale 1.05 on hover.

CategorySlider.card_style: Aspect video or square. Full image background with dark gradient overlay at bottom. Text white, bold, uppercase.

FilterTabs.style: Pill shape tabs. Active: Neon Green text + Border. Inactive: Text-muted.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Read this file completely before starting.
2. Do NOT change the dark theme variable foundation, only refine values if needed.
3. Implement 'BonusRow' as a new component in /src/components/BonusRow.jsx.
4. Use the provided image URLs for the categories.
5. Ensure the 'SİTEYE GİT' button has the specific neon glow shadow defined in styling.
6. Use 'Barlow Condensed' for all numbers and headings. It is CRITICAL for the sports look.
7. Mock the API data for the bonus list with at least 8 items to show scrolling.
8. The Hero section should be short. Just a title and a background image from visual_assets.
9. Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, tabs, links).

frontend.anti_slop: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
frontend.contrast: Ensure text is readable on dark backgrounds (WCAG AA).
frontend.code_quality: No inline styles unless dynamic. Use Tailwind utility classes.
